item.title: How Mihai Mincan’s Daughter Inspired His Venice Film ‘Milk Teeth,’ a Personal Tale of Childhood Under Ceaușescu, Trailer Unveiled (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Romanian filmmaker Mihai Mincan is back at the Venice Film Festival’s Horizons competition with “Milk Teeth,” a deeply personal drama set during the final days of Nicolae Ceaușescu&#
